This vignette can describe the use of the `CovidYe` package, including how to launch the shiny application, what the application can do, and the guidelines for its uses. 

## Installing CovidYe


```{r}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("etc5523-2020/r-package-assessment-Year-97")
```

## Launching shiny app

```{r launching}
library(CovidYe)
launch_app()
```



This package also provides the `coronavirus` dataset, which contains daily information for 188 countries over time.
